bibl.title: The Collapse of Celestial and Chthonic Realms in a Late Antique "Apollonian Invocation" (PGM I, 262-347).
bibl.note: Examines the Olympian and the Chthonian realms in P.G.M. I, 262-347, involving Apollo and necromancy.

bibl.title: Heavenly Realms and Earthly Realities in Late Antique Religions

bibl.seg: FARAONE Christopher A., The Collapse of Celestial and Chthonic Realms in a Late Antique "Apollonian Invocation" (PGM I, 262-347).
Ra'anan S. BOUSTAN and Annette Yoshiko REED (Edd.), Heavenly Realms and Earthly Realities in Late Antique Religions (Cambridge, 2004) pp. 213-232.
Examines the Olympian and the Chthonian realms in P.G.M. I, 262-347, involving Apollo and necromancy.
